channel.title: Change Shop Name
channel.description:
Hello. Ive found out how to add shops , i searched for 2 days for tuts how to add them. and ive just found it with out tutorial. but now the problem is - My shop name is Yanille general store ..
Where do i change the name ?
thx

item.title: Change Shop Name
item.dc:creator: @plompke plompke
item.description:
@plompke wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]You added a space in the shops.cfg.

The server has certain methods to load the shop, and only allows \t (tab character) and _ (space character, “underscore”)

Make sure you aren’t using the space button anywhere in the shops.cfg file, with the exception of:
shop(SPACE)=(SPACE)NUMBER[/quote]well , i did like this : Typed -> Shop - space -> = -> space ‘number’
is that wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Change Shop Name
item.dc:creator: @plompke plompke
item.description:
@plompke wrote:

[quote=“Joker^, post:4, topic:347183”]compile ?[/quote]I did , and compiler didnt gave me errors , but when i run server , it gives errors.

=(

Read full topic

item.title: Change Shop Name
item.dc:creator: @plompke plompke
item.description:
@plompke wrote:

[quote=“Joker^, post:2, topic:347183”]Go into your shops.cfg or what ever its called

mine looks like this

shop = 2 Aubury's_Rune_Store 2 2 554 50000 555 50000 556 50000 557 50000 559 50000 558 50000 562 50000 560 50000 565 50000 553 50000

and when i change the name it looks like this

shop = 2 Joker's_Store 2 2 554 50000 555 50000 556 50000 557 50000 559 50000 558 50000 562 50000 560 50000 565 50000 553 50000 [/quote]well . i have this there

shop = 60 Testt 1 1 4151 5000
But the name is still yanille …

Read full topic
